attributes.action: To make Frank Bruno a knight of the relm
attributes.background:
I would like your help in getting one of our nations true heroes and gentlemen knighted. The person I speak of is Frank Bruno. Frank has over the years captured the nations hearts and minds both in the ring and out of it and is a true inspiration to myself and others

Many thanks

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
